lead_paragraph: Apart from its snow-white marble floors and soaring features, the new Westfield World Trade Center looks like a mall that could be just about anywhere.

headline.print_headline: At Ground Zero, a Mall Uninformed by Its Sacred Land
headline.main: A Shopping Mall at Ground Zero, Uninformed by Its Sacred Land

snippet: Apart from its snow-white marble floors and soaring features, the new Westfield World Trade Center looks like a mall that could be just about anywhere....
abstract: David W Dunlap Building Blocks column shares experience of first visit to Westfield World Trade Center shopping mall inside World Trade Center's plaza's Oculus hall; says while it is heartening to see crowds teeming through soaring hall at last, it is dispiriting to find no indication of consecrated ground on which structure sits; contends significant role played by Westfield American in redevelopment of property should have been early clue that end result would be shopping mall that could be located anywhere in America.
